评论详情: I love this top! Super stretchy and soft, cropped at just the right length (sits just below belly button). Fabric is ribbed which is a nice touch. Color as advertised. I’m in between small-medium with long sleeves bc I don’t like the arms to be too tight - I went with small and it fits like a glove! Must have basic! Great quality! Not see through! I’m about 5’5 145lbs for reference.
The perfect basic long sleeve. Soft, stretchy, flattering and very comfortable. Buy multiple colors!

I love this shirt. I typically don’t like long sleeves but this one is soft, lightweight, has relatively long sleeves (and I like that look), and it’s a good crop on me. It lands right at the top of my jeans and I can partially tuck it if I want. It’s really stretchy and just looks pretty cute! I’m 5’8” and plus size!
Love the color (not too pink, not too mauve), love the fit and love the price. I wear it on repeat. I'm short (5'3) and this hits my waist just right. Will be ordering more!

Fabric is thin so it’s not hot, it’s comfortable to wear, it came wrinkly but it was easy to steam out the wrinkles. On the second photo is before (left side) and after (right side) i steam ironed it. For reference i am 5’4” and 120 lbs.

I have multiple of these shirts and plan to get more. I ordered a medium according to the size chart and it fits well. These shirts are definitely a bit short (fits like the model photos). They come right under my belly button but ride up a little bit. I have also purchased a large and that one fits a bit looser and longer but is still flattering and doesn't really look oversized. For reference, I am 5'3", 36/29/37.
Don’t love the cut on this. There’s extra material in the armpit area and which bothers me a little. The material is nice. I just wish it was more fitting.

I love this top! It's stretchy, affordable, and lightweight. It seems to be high quality for the price, but time will tell. I love how soft the shirt feels and the longer length. I am tall and had to size up to a medium, but a small would have been more flattering. There is ample room in the arms.
Fit well, light weight
Obsessed with this top. I have in four colors and it’s the best material and fit

I really like these shirts and they’re exactly as pictured. I ordered the dark grey one and the camel colored one. Color is true to life, fit is great. Only reason it’s not a full 5 stars is because quality of stitching isn’t the best. The stitching on the bottom of one the shirts has started to come undone but that’s an easy fix I can make myself. Other than that, I love these shirts and wear them all the time.

I'm honestly so pleasantly surprised with this top! I am pretty tall (a hair under 6 ft) with an athletic build -- broad, big shoulders & a muscular back, so anything with sleeves can be really tricky. This top is PERFECT -- the dark green color is rich & gorgeous, and fits beautifully. The sleeves are long enough, the fit in the shoulders & back is perfect, and the length is great -- it's very slightly cropped (hits just at my bellybutton) and is really soft and comfortable to wear. I don't normally have much luck with online clothing purchases because of my body type, but this is a fantastic shirt. It's so flattering & perfect on its own as a long sleeve shirt, or you could layer it up and dress it up. I definitely will be purchasing more colors!  For reference, I am 6' tall, around 165, 36" bust and 28" waist and bought a size Medium, which fits perfectly.

I have bought several colors in this crop shirt and love them.I am 5'1 and about 130 and have bought the medium which is snug but not uncomfortable,shows off the curves.Washes great and goes with everything.Have purchased the small and that too fits good and not uncomfortable like you are in a sausage casing,it depends on how snug you like your shirts,give them a try you will be happy.

I love this sweater! I'm short, so this sits right at my waistline.  It fit perfectly too. I usually wear a medium but ordered a large just in case. It's perfect b/c it's not hugging my body yet not baggy
What a beautiful tee shirt. The colors are so vibrant and the fit is just right. My only issue is that the sleeves are soooo long. I am 5’2” and I had to shorten them about 3”

I love the shape and cut of this shirt. It is very comfortable and has become a staple in my closet. However, I’m hesitant to buy other colors because it is a pretty thin material. I’m usually a small and sized up to a medium. I don’t think that was necessary but didn’t want it to be too tight, I’m happy I sized up.
Comfortable and not too tight, feels good quality and has some weight to it, can be dressed up. No complaints
Got those long sleeves in bunch of colors,  I’m very happy with the purchase. They’re great for every day.
I loved the material and fit of this top, it was snug but not tight. It was a little too cropped for me, and hit right above a high waisted pant
I like the fit but the color was not what I expected. It was a lighter baby yellow whereas what is advertised seems more like an almost greenish neon yellow.

评论概述: Best “crop” top ever for Petites!! Great for layering
评论详情: I liked these so much I have them in two different colors! I’m 5’1” and with long arms and a wide bust, tops can be tricky.  These are great for me because they are stretchy and not too short. I wanted something to layer but again, being petite, I was tired of shirts that hung far past the bottom hem of my jackets, sweaters, vests etc.  And I can wear them as is since they are considered a “crop” but on someone so short, they aren’t too short.
It does ride up, but it is a crop.  I can pull it down and tuck it in, then it doesn't ride up.  It is thin, but not see through and comfortable. Washes well.

评论概述: Reviews about extra room in the armpits is accurate
评论详情: The shirt is okay but I’ll be returning it for the reason stated in a few reviews I saw. The shirt fit well on my torso but the arms and armpit area was really loose and weird fitting.

I'm kind of a connoisseur of slim-fitting, minimalist tee shirts/tops. The ones I have range from very cheap to quite expensive and this one, in the low-moderate range, is one of my favorites.  I like the long sleeves and the above-the-hips length of this tee, as well as the stretchy fabric and crew neck. It looks great with jeans, black pants and my kilt-style mini-skirt. Beware, if you have a muffin top or rolls in general, they will definitely show. I find it comfortable and chic. It can be dressed up or down.
This top is what was expected. It goes with everything, which I love, but be careful of undergarments because it is a bit thinner than desired.

I am 5’4” and 130 pounds and ordered a medium but I am 71 and things are not as firm as they once were so I am going to give them to a granddaughter and order a large for a looser fit. Material felt great, I just want a little more wiggle room.

LOVE these tops!! I bought in the pinkish color and black and I will definitely be buying more colors. The perfect length so you’re not constantly tucking in, but not riding up. So easy to dress up or wear casually. Great price for the quality. I am around 130lbs, 34C, curvy/athletic build, and the small fit great!
Beautiful goldish tan color. True to size, loved the fit and the length . Very comfortable.

评论概述: My favorite shirt but the yellow color keeps coming stained
评论详情: I love this shirt. It’s my favorite. I want it in all the colors. Fitted, flattering, great cut for high waisted jeans-it’s short but not cropped.  I’m on my fourth color—I am desperately trying to get the yellow but it keeps coming with a black spot/possibly stain in the same spot.  So I’m returning it yet again and debating ordering it a third time—-third times the charm? But I fear the whole batch may be an issue—if you’re the company—can someone do a quality control check on the latest yellow stack?! Lol I’m dying to have it but not with a black spot!
This is a nice stretchy, soft, and fitted long sleeve that I love to wear to work or with high waisted pants. I am happy with this purchase and it is true to size.

True to size, perfect not-quite-a-crop shirt that is ideal for layering and looks great on its own! The ribbing makes it more interesting than all the Skims style shirts I see online these days and the fit is very flattering.
Love every bit of this shirt, it’s not too cropped, the material is not see through, it’s great quality, not too thick so it’s a perfect season transition top. I literally want every single color.

The material is nice, but it’s much shorter than it looks. Even with super high rise jeans your mid section will show.
Too tight and had to order the next size up.
Great top! It can be dressed up or worn with sweats. Comfy, well made and I love the fit. Great color options as well.

Thick, high quality material. Hugs in all the right places. Sits just above belly button so pairs perfectly with high waisted jeans. I’m 5’2 and 115 and got XS because the S fit a little loose in the armpit area for me. I had to get it in another color.

Shirt looks like pictured. Beautiful forest green color. Ordered small, true to size, soft & good quality. Light weight & not sheer. Shirt can be dressed up or down, so very versatile. Planning to purchase again in another color.

Love the color.  The length could be longer
Pretty much get what you pay for.  This is an OK top for a base layer under my Sweaters for Winter that tend to itch me.
Good quality top that looks awesome on. It is true to size.
True size is a Large. Ordered XL. it’s a crop top.

I like the shirt.  The Kelly green is beautiful.  But I ordered an XS for my sister and it runs extremely small.  I had to return it and she is asking for a medium.  Big jump in sizes.  We will see how it fits her.
